title: Mt Fuji
content:
Today was all about Mt Fuji!

Thankfully we had decent weather, so the mountain was in good view for most of the day. We have been seeing it many days on the trip, hanging out in the background as we travelled through different areas, but today we were heading for it.

We had a stop at a rest stop with a great view of the mountain, then it was up to 5th station for lunch and all the views. We explored all around the station building, got photos of the mountain and surrounds from all angles, and did a little souvenir shopping to round out our time on the mountain.

It was great to get up to 5th station again, and to actually have clear view of the mountain and surrounds unlike 17 years earlier...

Our next stop was for a lake cruise at the bottom of the mountain. This was all kinds of silly and fun - the cruise boat was shaped like a giant swan, and while we waited we had the opportunity to feed some ducks and swans at the water's edge. The cruise itself was neat, with the boat having a very interesting layout, and we had great views of Mt Fuji hanging over the lake. It was a different cruise for sure, but we had a good time.

With Mt Fuji behind us, we were heading back towards Tokyo (Yokohama) for our final night of the trip.
